ticket.title: Tool handlers: replace Read/Write/Execute stubs with real implementations

tickets.reason: Session RequestTool path must be wired before tool handlers are exercised.

in_scope: Implement real ReadFileHandler with workspace-relative paths and bounds.
Implement real WriteFileHandler with atomic writes and bounds.
Implement ExecuteHandler with sandboxed execution and bounded output.

steps: Replace stub handler logic with real filesystem I/O.
Implement sandboxed command execution for ExecuteHandler.
Add integration tests for Read/Write/Execute behavior.

criteria: ReadFileHandler returns real file contents with bounds.
WriteFileHandler performs real writes with atomic semantics.
ExecuteHandler runs commands in sandbox with bounded stdout/stderr.

notes.security:
Real tool execution must preserve workspace confinement, bounded output,
and fail-closed behavior.
notes.general: Enables minimal, bounded tool execution for implementor/reviewer workflows.
